author: kondratyevd
body:
The new files are needed for the revised DNN strategy for OI seed generation: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37437.
This is a follow-up on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35237, https://github.com/cms-data/RecoMuon-TrackerSeedGenerator/pull/2.

Also deleting the older classifier models, as they will not work with the new plugin.
title: Updated DNN classifier for outside-in seed generation in Muon HLT
